messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] re:Good morning america
messages.msgSnippet: -=- That we have been brainwashed basically to believe that if we don t follow a certain path then we are doomed to failure. What people don t realize is that
messages.messageBody:
-=- That we have been brainwashed basically to believe that if we
don't follow a certain path then we are doomed to failure. What
people don't realize is that this has been set up so that people
continue to be sheeople, they are just part of perpetuating all the
problems that we are facing in the US. Ok maybe that is a bit much-=-

***I don't think it's too much to say that, only it's not just the US.***


It's in every industrialized nation around the world. Last night I sent someone a link to Sir Ken Robinson's website with a note attatched that said "I'm not afraid to be wrong, are you? Live life and have fun. Best wishes to you." Here's the link I sent http://www.sirkenrobinson.com/

I chose Sir Ken Robinson because he has a lot to say about the creative process and how schools harm it, but also, he's more about school reform than the abolishment of the school system, which the recipient will appreciate more.





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: re:Good morning america
messages.msgSnippet: The thing my children and I were most bothered by, I think, was the question posed by the interviewer Isn t it the job of the parents to MAKE their kids do
messages.messageBody:
The thing my children and I were most bothered by, I think, was the question posed by the interviewer "Isn't it the job of the parents to MAKE their kids do things they don't want to do?"  What kind of parent wants to be doing that?  
I would love to hear the entire interview, I mean it was certainly edited to be sensationalized.  I kept answering for the parents in the ways I wish they did.  But they may have had better answers that were edited out.  What I think needs to come across to people is the fact that the way the general public feels about education is NOT the only way to go.  That we have been brainwashed basically to believe that if we don't follow a certain path then we are doomed to failure.  What people don't realize is that this has been set up so that people continue to be sheeople, they are just part of perpetuating all the problems that we are facing in the US.  Ok maybe that is a bit much but I just wish they gave the parents a real chance to explain the reasons for unschooling and how it has worked.  If the scope could be widened as to how people view learning it would help the entire world:) 
 OK rant over!

Mary mama to Dylan (11), Colin (6 1/2) and Theo Benjamin (2 1/2)
"Be who you want your children to be."    Unknown   "Each morning we are born again.  What we do today is what matters most."    Buddha

"Men will never be free until the last king is strangled with the entrails of the last priest."
    Denis Diderot






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
